entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
